strategiesDesc.analogous: Colors that are next to each other on the color wheel.
strategiesDesc.complementary: Colors that are opposite each other on the color wheel.
strategiesDesc.triadic: Colors that are evenly spaced around the color wheel.
strategiesDesc.tetradic: Four colors arranged into two complementary pairs.
strategiesDesc.monochromatic: Different shades and tints of a single hue.
strategiesDesc.split-complementary: Base color plus two colors adjacent to its complement.

preview.title: UI Preview
preview.heroDesc: Generate beautiful color schemes for your projects.
